title: Pittsburgh Had The Highest Super Bowl Ratings | The Morning Freak Show | 96.1 KISS
text:
Pittsburgh Had The Highest Super Bowl Ratings posted by Mikey and Bob - Just now share 
No clue how this is even possible.... 
The overnight ratings are out and Pittsburgh is the city that had the highest TV ratings for Super Bowl LI. 
Do we just love watching football or did we all hate watch it hoping for a Patriots loss.... Pittsburgh was the highest-rated market for Super Bowl LI with a 57.9 rating. â€” Michael Mulvihill (@mulvihill79) February 6, 2017 Top five markets for SB51:1. Pittsburgh - 57.9
